name: Open Geospatial Data by Esri China (Hong Kong) Ltd.
description: Open Geospatial Data in HK. DATA.GOV.HK is an open data pool with various comprehensive data available for public use, and some of which are spatially enabled. Esri China (HK) Ltd. has utilized these data and created different types of layers and webmaps for Esri users to enrich their GIS applications. The source data format is processed and converted to Esri File Geodatabase format and then uploaded to Esri’s ArcGIS Online platform for sharing and reference purposes. The objectives are to facilitate our Hong Kong ArcGIS Online users to use the data in a spatial ready format and save their data conversion effort.
